verses.verse: Now these <S%H428><s%> are the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> defeated, <S%H5221><s%> and whose land <S%H776><s%> they possessed <S%H3423><s%> beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> toward the sunrise, <S%H4217><s%> <S%H8121><s%> from the valley <S%H5158><s%> of the Arnon <S%H769><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as Mount <S%H2022><s%> Hermon, <S%H2768><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the Arabah <S%H6160><s%> to the east: <S%H4217><s%>

Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> in Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> [and] ruled <S%H4910><s%> from Aroer, <S%H6177><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is on the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the valley <S%H5158><s%> of the Arnon, <S%H769><s%> both the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the valley <S%H5158><s%> and half <S%H2677><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> even as far <S%H5704><s%> as the brook <S%H5158><s%> Jabbok, <S%H2999><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon; <S%H5983><s%>

and the Arabah <S%H6160><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as the Sea <S%H3220><s%> of Chinneroth <S%H3672><s%> toward the east, <S%H4217><s%> and as far <S%H5704><s%> as the sea <S%H3220><s%> of the Arabah, <S%H6160><s%> [even] the Salt <S%H4417><s%> Sea, <S%H3220><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%> toward <S%H1870><s%> Beth-jeshimoth, and on the south, <S%H8486><s%> at the foot <S%H8478><s%> of the slopes <S%H794><s%> of Pisgah; <S%H6449><s%>

and the territory <S%H1366><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> one of the remnant <S%H3499><s%> of Rephaim, <S%H7497><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> at Ashtaroth <S%H6252><s%> and at Edrei, <S%H154><s%>

and ruled <S%H4910><s%> over Mount <S%H2022><s%> Hermon <S%H2768><s%> and Salecah <S%H5548><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as the border <S%H1366><s%> of the Geshurites <S%H1651><s%> and the Maacathites, <S%H4602><s%> and half <S%H2677><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> [as far as] the border <S%H1366><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon. <S%H2809><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> defeated <S%H5221><s%> them; and Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> it to the Reubenites <S%H7206><s%> and the Gadites, <S%H1425><s%> and the half-tribe of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> as a possession. <S%H3425><s%>

Now these <S%H428><s%> are the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> defeated <S%H5221><s%> beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> toward the west, <S%H3220><s%> from Baal-gad in the valley <S%H1237><s%> of Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> even as far <S%H5704><s%> as Mount <S%H2022><s%> Halak, <S%H2510><s%> which rises <S%H5927><s%> toward Seir; <S%H8165><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> it to the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> as a possession <S%H3425><s%> according to their divisions, <S%H4256><s%>

in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country, <S%H2022><s%> in the lowland, <S%H8219><s%> in the Arabah, <S%H6160><s%> on the slopes, <S%H794><s%> and in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and in the Negev; <S%H5045><s%> the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> the Amorite <S%H567><s%> and the Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> the Perizzite, <S%H6522><s%> the Hivite <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusite: <S%H2983><s%>

the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jericho, <S%H3405><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Ai, <S%H5857><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is beside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6654><s%> Bethel, <S%H1008><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Hebron, <S%H2275><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jarmuth, <S%H3412><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Lachish, <S%H3923><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
the king <S%H4428><s%> of Eglon, <S%H5700><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Gezer, <S%H1507><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
the king <S%H4428><s%> of Debir, <S%H1688><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Geder, <S%H1445><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
the king <S%H4428><s%> of Hormah, <S%H2767><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Arad, <S%H6166><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
the king <S%H4428><s%> of Libnah, <S%H3841><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Adullam, <S%H5725><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
the king <S%H4428><s%> of Makkedah, <S%H4719><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Bethel, <S%H1008><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
the king <S%H4428><s%> of Tappuah, <S%H8599><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Hepher, <S%H9157><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
the king <S%H4428><s%> of Aphek, <S%H663><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Lasharon, <S%H8289><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
the king <S%H4428><s%> of Madon, <S%H4068><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Hazor, <S%H2674><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
the king <S%H4428><s%> of Shimron-meron, one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Achshaph, <S%H407><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
the king <S%H4428><s%> of Taanach, <S%H8590><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Megiddo, <S%H4023><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
the king <S%H4428><s%> of Kedesh, <S%H6943><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jokneam <S%H3362><s%> in Carmel, <S%H3760><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>

the king <S%H4428><s%> of Dor <S%H1756><s%> in the heights <S%H9338><s%> of Dor, <S%H1756><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Goiim <S%H1471><s%> in Gilgal, <S%H1537><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
the king <S%H4428><s%> of Tirzah, <S%H8656><s%> one: <S%H259><s%> in all, <S%H3605><s%> thirty-one kings. <S%H4428><s%>
